instructions:
In a cast iron skillet heat butter and oil over medium heat till foam subsides. Add chicken and sauté, turn
till golden brown. Remove chicken to baking dish and pour off excess fat. Add wine and thyme to hot skillet
and deglaze. Pour the pan juices over chicken and salt and pepper. Sprinkle with lemon juice and bake in
lower 1/3 of oven at 400 F for 30 minutes or until tender.
name: Lemon Baked Chicken Breasts
